thread.title: BRIEF-Proteostasis Therapeutics Announces Withdrawal Of Equity Offering Due To Market Conditions

title: BRIEF-Proteostasis Therapeutics Announces Withdrawal Of Equity Offering Due To Market Conditions

organizations.name: brief-proteostasis therapeutics announces withdrawal of equity

text: 05 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Proteostasis Therapeutics Announces Withdrawal Of Equity Offering Due To Market Conditions Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Proteostasis Therapeutics Inc: * PROTEOSTASIS THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES WITHDRAWAL OF EQUITY OFFERING DUE TO MARKET CONDITIONS * PROTEOSTASIS THERAPEUTICS INC - ‍NOT PROCEEDING WITH PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF 9 MILLION SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK IN UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING * PROTEOSTASIS THERAPEUTICS - ‍CURRENT MARKET CONDITIONS NOT CONDUCIVE FOR OFFERING ON TERMS THAT WOULD BE IN BEST INTEREST OF ITS CURRENT STOCKHOLDERS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
